Package net.royalur.model

Class Move<P extends Piece>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.model.Move<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of piece that is being moved and that may be captured.
    public class Move<P extends Piece>
extends java.lang.Object
    A move that can be made on a board.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected P capturedPiece
      The piece that will be captured by this move, or null if no piece would be captured by this move.
      protected Tile from
      The origin of the move.
      protected P fromPiece
      The piece on the board to be moved, or null if a new piece is to be moved onto the board.
      Player player
      The instigator of this move.
      protected Tile to
      The destination of the move.
      protected P toPiece
      The piece that will be placed at the destination of the move, or null if moving a piece off of the board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Move​(Player player, Tile from, P fromPiece, Tile to, P toPiece, P capturedPiece)
      Creates a new move with origin from and destination to.

    • Field Detail

      • player

        @Nonnull
public final Player player
        The instigator of this move.

      • from

        @Nullable
protected final Tile from
        The origin of the move. If this is null, it represents moving a new piece onto the board.

      • fromPiece

        @Nullable
protected final P extends Piece fromPiece
        The piece on the board to be moved, or null if a new piece is to be moved onto the board.

      • to

        @Nullable
protected final Tile to
        The destination of the move. If this is null, it represents moving a piece off of the board.

      • toPiece

        @Nullable
protected final P extends Piece toPiece
        The piece that will be placed at the destination of the move, or null if moving a piece off of the board.

      • capturedPiece

        @Nullable
protected final P extends Piece capturedPiece
        The piece that will be captured by this move, or null if no piece would be captured by this move.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Move

        public Move​(@Nonnull
            Player player,
            @Nullable
            Tile from,
            @Nullable
            P fromPiece,
            @Nullable
            Tile to,
            @Nullable
            P toPiece,
            @Nullable
            P capturedPiece)
        Creates a new move with origin from and destination to. If from is null, it represents moving a new piece onto the board. If to is null, it represents moving a piece off of the board.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is the instigator of this move.
        from - The origin of the move. If this is null, it represents moving a new piece onto the board.
        fromPiece - The piece on the board to be moved, or null if a new piece is to be moved onto the board.
        to - The destination of the move. If this is null, it represents moving a piece off of the board.
        toPiece - The piece that will be placed at the destination of the move, or null if moving a piece off of the board.
        capturedPiece - The piece that will be captured by this move, or null if no piece would be captured by this move.

    • Method Detail

      • isIntroducingPiece

        public boolean isIntroducingPiece()
        Determines whether this move is moving a new piece onto the board.
        Returns:
        Whether this move is moving a new piece onto the board.

      • isScoringPiece

        public boolean isScoringPiece()
        Determines whether this move is moving a piece off of the board.
        Returns:
        Whether this move is moving a piece off of the board.

      • capturesPiece

        public boolean capturesPiece()
        Determines whether this move is capturing an existing piece on the board.
        Returns:
        Whether this move is capturing an existing piece on the board.

      • isLandingOnRosette

        public boolean isLandingOnRosette​(@Nonnull
                                  BoardShape shape)
        Determines whether this move will land a piece on a rosette. Under common rule sets, this will give another turn to the player.
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape of the board.
        Returns:
        Whether this move will land a piece on a rosette.

      • getSource

        @Nonnull
public Tile getSource()
        Retrieves the source tile of this move. If there is no source tile, in the case where a new piece is moved onto the board, this will throw an error.
        Returns:
        The source tile of this move.

      • getSourcePiece

        @Nonnull
public P getSourcePiece()
        Retrieves the source piece of this move. If there is no source piece, in the case where a new piece is moved onto the board, this will throw an error.
        Returns:
        The source piece of this move.

      • getDestination

        @Nonnull
public Tile getDestination()
        Retrieves the destination tile of this move. If there is no destination tile, in the case where a piece is moved off the board, this will throw an error.
        Returns:
        The destination tile of this move.

      • getDestinationPiece

        @Nonnull
public P getDestinationPiece()
        Retrieves the destination piece of this move. If there is no destination piece, in the case where a piece is moved off the board, this will throw an error.
        Returns:
        The destination piece of this move.

      • getCapturedPiece

        @Nonnull
public P getCapturedPiece()
        Retrieves the piece that will be captured by this move. If there is no piece that will be displayed, this will throw an error.
        Returns:
        The piece that will be captured by this move.

      • apply

        public void apply​(@Nonnull
                  Board<P> board)
        Apply this move to update the board board.
        Parameters:
        board - The board to update by applying this move.
